code: import React from"react";import Button from"react-bootstrap/Button";import Modal from"react-bootstrap/Modal";import"./ImageSelectModal.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ImageSelectModal=_ref=>{let{modalOpen,setModalOpen,getImage,uploadImg,currentImage,validImage}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:modalOpen,onHide:()=>setModalOpen(false),backdrop:"static",keyboard:false,centered:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{children:"Upload Profile Image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-upload-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:currentImage.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"image-upload",className:"upload-btn",children:"Add an image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{hidden:true,id:"image-upload",type:"file",accept:"image/jpeg, image/jpg, image/png",onChange:getImage})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Footer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{disabled:validImage&&currentImage.name?false:true,variant:"primary",onClick:uploadImg,children:"Save Profile Picture"})})]})});};export default ImageSelectModal;
